title: Ep. 667 Conservative America Can Win the Culture Wars
description:
In this episode I discuss the liberals' misguided view that they are “winning” the culture wars. It’s a common view in elitist circles that ignores the long-term trends. We are winning, not them.
 
A great piece that explains why the Left refuses to discuss arming school staff.
 
This troubling piece puts forth the misguided premise that liberals are “winning” the culture wars. They aren’t. 
 
It’s time to fight back against the growing economic and cultural battles liberals are waging against us. 
 
Is YouTube relying on a radical, extremist organization to police content?
 
This MSNBC host thinks the Second Amendment doesn’t apply to rifles. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
